analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenExchange.buy (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#449-457):
	External calls:
	- token.increaseApproval(this,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#451-452)
	- token.transferFrom(this,msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#452)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- buyPrice (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#452-455)

TokenExchange.buy (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#449-457) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.increaseApproval(this,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#451-452)
	-token.transferFrom(this,msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#452)

PurchaseRuleManager.buyUnlock (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#514-528) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_buyerAddress,distributed) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol#527-528)

Reentrancy in NeonToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ruleProvider.isUnlocked(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol)

Reentrancy in NeonToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ruleProvider.isUnlocked(_from)) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/18/0xa0167dc7b0c4dc372209b067203c1b393073cab4.sol)
